data.comment: The match is underway in London.
Stuart Attwell signals a Aston Villa throw-in in Chelsea's half.
In the minute 1, Aston Villa awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Chelsea capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Aston Villa's half?
In the minute 4, Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
Can Chelsea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Aston Villa's half?
Throw-in for Aston Villa at Stamford Bridge.
In the minute 5, Corner awarded to Chelsea.
Antonio Rudiger gets his shot on target but fails to score for Chelsea.
Free kick Aston Villa.
In the minute 7, In London Aston Villa drive forward through Jack Grealish. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
Aston Villa drive upfield and Anwar El Ghazi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Chelsea defender.
In the minute 8, Aston Villa to take a throw-in in Chelsea territory.
Goal kick for Chelsea at Stamford Bridge.
Throw-in high up the field for Chelsea in London.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Aston Villa in the half of Chelsea.
Chelsea's Christian Pulisic breaks free at Stamford Bridge. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Stuart Attwell awards Aston Villa a goal kick.
In the minute 14, Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
Christian Pulisic (Chelsea) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
In the minute 15, Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Chelsea.
Ball safe as Aston Villa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
In the minute 17, In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Aston Villa in their own half.
Bertrand Traore (Aston Villa) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 19, Throw-in Chelsea.
Aston Villa's Ollie Watkins misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Chelsea goal kick.
In the minute 21, Stuart Attwell awards the home team a throw-in.
Chelsea awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
In the minute 22, Attention is being given to Aston Villaâ€™s Matty Cash and play has been suspended briefly.
Throw-in for Aston Villa in the half of Chelsea.
Aston Villa's Matty Cash is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Chelsea at Stamford Bridge.
Free kick Aston Villa.
Kortney Hause (Aston Villa) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 25, It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Chelsea awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Aston Villa in the half of Chelsea.
In the minute 29, Throw-in Chelsea.
Matty Cash of Aston Villa gets in a strike, but is off target.
Chelsea have a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Stuart Attwell signals a throw-in for Chelsea, close to Aston Villa's area.
Chelsea are pushing forward but Olivier Giroud's finish is wide of the goal.
Chelsea are coming forward and Christian Pulisic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 33, Aston Villa have a goal kick.
Stuart Attwell awards the home team a throw-in.
Chelsea's Olivier Giroud scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 34, Benjamin Chilwell with an assist there.
Throw-in for Chelsea in their own half.
Chelsea needs to be cautious. Aston Villa have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 38, Ball safe as Chelsea is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Mason Mount of Chelsea gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Aston Villa goal kick.
In the minute 40, In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Aston Villa in their own half.
Ball safe as Chelsea is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 43, Can Aston Villa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chelsea's half?
Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
Stuart Attwell awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in London.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Aston Villa.
In the minute 45, Stuart Attwell blows to end the first-half.
Cesar Azpilicueta (Chelsea) gets a yellow card.
The second-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Aston Villa at Stamford Bridge.
In the minute 46, Jack Grealish for Aston Villa is whistled offside.
Throw-in Aston Villa.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Aston Villa in their own half.
Anwar El Ghazi gets an equalizer for Aston Villa. The score is now 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Matty Cash.
In the minute 53, Aston Villa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Chelsea in the half of Aston Villa.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 56, Ball safe as Aston Villa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Stuart Attwell awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 58, Chelsea's N`Golo Kante misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Aston Villa at Stamford Bridge.
N`Golo Kante of Chelsea smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Aston Villa in their own half.
Free kick for Aston Villa in the half of Chelsea.
Aston Villa have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 62, Chelsea awarded a free kick in their own half.
Stuart Attwell signals a Chelsea throw-in in Aston Villa's half.
Chelsea to take a throw-in in Aston Villa territory.
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Chelsea.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Chelsea drive forward but Christian Pulisic is judged offside.
In the minute 66, Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
Corner awarded to Chelsea.
Throw-in for Aston Villa close to the penalty box.
In the minute 68, Throw-in Chelsea.
John McGinn hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Aston Villa.
Stuart Attwell awards Chelsea a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Chelsea's Callum Hudson-Odoi gets in a shot on goal at Stamford Bridge. But the effort is unsuccessful.
At Stamford Bridge, Olivier Giroud has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Anwar El Ghazi (Aston Villa) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in high up the field for Chelsea in London.
In the minute 72, Frank Lampard is making the team's first substitution at Stamford Bridge with Timo Werner replacing Olivier Giroud.
Kai Havertz is on a sub for Jorginho for Chelsea.
In the minute 74, Free kick Aston Villa.
N`Golo Kante (Chelsea) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Chelsea in the half of Aston Villa.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Aston Villa in their own half.
Christian Pulisic for Chelsea drives towards goal at Stamford Bridge. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
In the minute 80, Chelsea push forward at Stamford Bridge and Benjamin Chilwell gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Aston Villa defence.
Corner awarded to Chelsea.
Stuart Attwell signals a Aston Villa throw-in in Chelsea's half.
In the minute 81, Dean Smith (Aston Villa) is making a first substitution, with Jacob Ramsey replacing Anwar El Ghazi.
Aston Villa's Jacob Ramsey gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Stuart Attwell awards Chelsea a goal kick.
In the minute 83, Timo Werner for Chelsea gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Aston Villa have a goal kick.
Chelsea to take a throw-in in Aston Villa territory.
In the minute 85, It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Aston Villa needs to be cautious. Chelsea have an attacking throw-in.
Chelsea's Mason Mount gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Aston Villa defender.
In the minute 87, Goal kick for Aston Villa at Stamford Bridge.
Keinan Davis is replacing Bertrand Traore for Aston Villa at Stamford Bridge.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Chelsea in their own half.
In the minute 89, Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
Can Chelsea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Aston Villa's half?
Chelsea have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
In London, Antonio Rudiger (Chelsea) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Aston Villa goal kick.
Stuart Attwell will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
Chelsea awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In London Chelsea attack through Benjamin Chilwell. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Aston Villa.
Jacob Ramsey (Aston Villa) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
